subject: RE: [junit] How do I test code with Javascript ?
msgSnippet: Hi Anand, you may also have a look at jsunit.berlios.de. This JsUnit is more focused on server-side JavaScript or using Windows Scripting Host with command
messageBody:
Hi Anand,

you may also have a look at jsunit.berlios.de. This JsUnit is more focused
on server-side JavaScript or using Windows Scripting Host with command line
support.

Greetings,
Jorg

>-----Original Message-----
>From: anand_73@... [mailto:anand_73@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, August 21, 2001 1:44 PM
>To: junit@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [junit] How do I test code with Javascript ?
>
>
>Hi all
>
>How do I test code with Javascript in it ?
>I have a shopping cart example where I have quite an amount of
>Javascript.
>How do I test for example submitting a transaction ?
>
>Thanks
>Anand
>
